title: Amma Appava Lyrics Kagitha Kappal
stanzas:
Ammaa appava 
Kudumbatha paaru
Appaala thaane
Cinema star-u

Sonnadhu yaaru
Thala thaaney
Suthamana manam 
Idhu thaaney

Manja vaikkum
Selavellaam edhukku
Anbu irundhaa
Adhu podhum enakku

Sonnadhu yaaru
Thala thaaney
Suthamana manam 
Idhu thaaney

Spanner pudicha
Mechanic thodangi
Banner pudikkum
Ikkaalam varaikkum

Thalayoda valarchi 
Ye nesamaave magizhchi

Ye thala ezhuthe maarun
Thala pola ulachi

Thala pera solli paaru
Kallu kooda karaiyum
Kottra mazhaila yethivechcha
Karpuram kooda eriyum

Paththaadhuda
Thalaikku thaaney 
Nooru kodi vasulu

Thala pera solli paaru
Kuzhandha adikkum Whistle 
Kuzhandha adikkum Whistle 
Kuzhandha adikkum Whistle 

Ye thanane thandhane
Thaane thandhaane
